title: OpenAI Hits $5 Trillion Valuation After GPT-5 Launch – Bigger Than Apple
shortdescription: Sam Altman becomes world's first trillionaire as investors pour $500B in new round.
description: GPT-5 passes every human benchmark — Microsoft, Nvidia, and sovereign funds fight for allocation in largest private funding round ever.
author: FinTech Guru

title: Robinhood Crypto Wallet Surpasses 1 Billion Users – Bigger Than PayPal
shortdescription: Free stock trading app now world's largest crypto platform overnight.
description: Robinhood Wallet overtakes Coinbase and Binance in active users after launching zero-fee Bitcoin/Ethereum trading and self-custody.
author: FinTech Guru

title: Apple Shuts Down Apple Pay Later After $8 Billion Losses – Affirm Stock Up 60%
shortdescription: Apple admits defeat in BNPL war — exits consumer lending entirely.
description: Apple Pay Later users forced to Affirm or Klarna — Apple writes off entire lending division after massive defaults.
author: FinTech Guru

title: Revolut Hits $100 Billion Valuation – Europe's First Tech Centicorn
shortdescription: UK neobank now worth more than Barclays + Lloyds combined.
description: Revolut goes public at $100B+ after getting full UK banking license and launching crypto exchange with zero fees.
author: FinTech Guru
